mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_recored_comment (rcmt_content, created_at, mem_id) VALUES (#{content}, sysdate, #{writer});
INSERT INTO tbl_freeboard_comment (board_idx, cmt_content, created_at, mem_id) VALUES (#{comment_Num}, #{content}, sysdate, #{writer});
INSERT INTO tbl_team_comment (board_idx, cmt_content, created_at, mem_id) VALUES (#{comment_Num}, #{content}, sysdate, #{writer});
mapper.update: update tbl_recored_comment set rcmt_content=#{content} where rcmt_idx =#{comment_Num} and mem_id=#{writer}
update tbl_freeboard_comment set cmt_content=#{content} where cmt_idx =#{comment_Num} and mem_id=#{writer}
update tbl_team_comment set cmt_content=#{content} where cmt_idx =#{comment_Num} and mem_id=#{writer}
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_recored_comment where mem_id=#{writer} and rcmt_idx=#{comment_Num}
delete from tbl_freeboard_comment where mem_id=#{writer} and cmt_idx=#{comment_Num}
delete from tbl_team_comment where mem_id=#{writer} and cmt_idx=#{comment_Num}
